Record.ClassificationPath: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Genetic Diseases, Inborn/Metabolism, Inborn Errors/Hyperbilirubinemia, Hereditary/Gilbert Disease
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Metabolism, Inborn Errors/Hyperbilirubinemia, Hereditary/Gilbert Disease
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: A benign familial disorder, transmitted as an autosomal dominant trait. It is characterized by low-grade chronic hyperbilirubinemia with considerable daily fluctuations of the bilirubin level.
